abstract: Federal judge rejects Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev's retrial bid and orders him to pay over $101 million in restitution to family of victims, which he is unable to pay.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge rejected a bid for a new trial for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev and ordered him to pay victims of the deadly attack more than $101 million in restitution.

headline.main: Massachusetts: No Retrial for Marathon Bomber
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: No Retrial for Marathon Bomber

snippet: A federal judge rejected a bid for a new trial for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev and ordered him to pay victims of the deadly attack more than $101 million in restitution.
